pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Portfolio123 API WrapperSample code:```pythonimport p123apitry: client = p123api.Client(api_id='your api id', api_key='your api key') print(client.screen_run({'screen': {'type': 'stock', 'universe': 'nasdaq100'}, 'asOfDt': '2020-05-12'}))except p123api.ClientException as e: print(e)```
